2.title: Frankie Forklift Learns Colors and Shapes
2.plot: Frankie Forklift in the warehouse with Petee Pallet and Sally Shrink Wrapper learns about colors, shapes and teamwork.

imdb.plot outline: Follow Frankie Forklift's adventures in the warehouse, where he inspires children to learn, play, and use their imaginations. Friends, Larry Lift Truck, Petee Pallet and Sally Shrink Wrapper, join in as we learn about warehouses, safety, and life lessons. Children ages 2-6 love the happy characters while parents enjoy the positive messages.
imdb.title: Frankie Forklift and Friends
plot: Frankie Forklift starts a new adventure. It's his first day of work at the warehouse, but Frankie must do some chores - like brush his teeth and clean his room - before he can begin his journey.::Andrew Stawiarski

Follow Frankie Forklift's adventures in the warehouse, where he inspires children to learn, play, and use their imaginations. Friends, Larry Lift Truck, Petee Pallet and Sally Shrink Wrapper, join in as we learn about warehouses, safety, and life lessons. Children ages 2-6 love the happy characters while parents enjoy the positive messages.::Andrew Stawiarski
